artefact: Do you need a UK visa?

artefact.overview: Find out if you need a UK visa to work, study, visit, transit through or join your family in the UK, and how to apply
artefact.introduction: You'll answer questions about your reasons for coming to the UK, your nationality and where you're living. You'll be told whether you need a UK visa and how to apply.

artefact.title: British citizenship and moving to the UK

details.description: Includes visas, Life in the UK test, citizenship ceremonies and asylum

parent.title: Citizenship and life in the UK

details.description: Includes voting and how government works
